title: Limitless Ascension: Strength Amid Adversity
summary: With a system that grows stronger against it’s enemies, Ye Jun Ling who almost passed away from old age began his cheating life of cultivating with no upper limits. Divine emperor? Saint? The heavenly principles? Stand aside! Other than that, he also had several disciples. The senior disciple is a demonic sect master, with vicious heart and treacherous mind, but got easily taken care of everytime! The second disciple is a white hair loli, with the number one divine constitution, likes to cook despite being super strong, and serve her master…

title: In the Name of Your Death
summary:
1) Covetous You and Insensible Me (Hoshigariana Kimi to Futsutsukana Boku)  
Never one to get close to strangers, Kai finds himself helpess in the enchanting gaze of a foreigner…  
  
2) Lost in the Darkness Before Dawn (Gyou An ni Mayou)  
Tatsumi Hiroaki is a swordsman for hire during the Edo Period. Recently, a rise in bandit activity has given him a steady flow of work in protecting small shops in town. The bandits recognize his skill and offer to hire him, where he finds a familiar face from the past.  
  
3) Confession (Kokuhaku)  
Unable to forget the random act of kindness by the wealthy, but lonely business man, Matsumi offers to sell his body. Is it really just for money, or is there a greater need at stake?  
  
4) The night he escaped death (Shi ni Zokonai no Yoru)  
Prequel of Lost in the Darkness Before Dawn.  
  
5) Sleepless Night  
The Night He Escaped Death bonus.  
  
6) Service  
Confession bonus.  
  
7) Bonds of Blood  
Covetous You and Insensible Me bonus.

title: You Can Hear It
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: The Sold Young Lady Is Protected by Her Brothers
The contract marriage has come to an end
summary: The contract marriage, which began as a deception, has come to an end. I sought freedom from the household, while he needed the support of my family’s background to establish himself. After three years, we successfully concluded the contract marriage. With a stamp on the divorce papers, we could finally embrace the lives we each desired. “Now, how about preparing for the divorce?” “What? What are you talking about?” “Let’s start preparing for the divorce.” “So, what exactly is divorce?” Wait, what’s happening all of a sudden? The affectionate contract husband of three years seems to have disappeared, leaving only the indifferent Duke. “We promised, let’s stamp the divorce papers right away!”

title: Worthless Profession: Dragon Tamer
summary: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.

title: Predatory Marriage
summary:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."

title: Try Begging Me
summary: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country's joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It's become too much of a despairing environment that he's come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!

title: I Will Pay the Price for Deceiving You With My Life
summary: A master assassin, raised to kill for a "father" who wasn’t truly hers, dies by his poison then awakens in her childhood. Now, with the truth seared into her soul, she vows to turn his own game against him: "This time, I’ll be the one holding the poisoned cup." A dark tale of twisted legacies and the daughter who breaks the cycle.

title: The Time-Limited Villainess Who Makes Medicine
The Visitor Of The Night
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: SSS-Grade Cafe in Front of The Dungeon
summary: After dying from overwork, the protagonist wakes up three years in the past. Determined to escape the grind, they open a cozy café in their grandmother's old shop—only to unlock a "Café Owner" class with magical coffee skills. But their peaceful life takes a turn when mysterious quests and dangers emerge.

title: In The Night, At The Duke’s Mansion
The Silent Transfer Student
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: I Became the Beastman’s Wife
summary:
In the novel *The Emperor and the Saintess*, the male lead and heroine were able to defeat the cursed dragons and the demons, as well as the final boss of the story, with their beautiful love.

"...Haha. I'd rather die now, so I can go in peace."

Rather than having a brilliant future and being hailed as a genius mage, I just want a secure future where I can have a comfortable retirement... That's what I wish, but when this world comes to an end, I'm the final boss. Please, just let me live... However, "Wait, isn't this the male lead, Siegren? Why is he here?"

Siegren, the heroic male lead who will save the world, is dying right in front of my eyes? The male lead whose mind and body where all tattered from rolling around in the battlefield.

"Siegren, I'm sure you'll have many things to do in the future. I promise to help you achieve that."

When I saw Siegren's wounds, I made a promise. This person, who suffered because of the lines I wrote. I promise to bring him happiness, a brilliant future, and a comfortable life.

---
Evil mage Fiona Green was destined to die at the hands of the protagonist couple in *The Emperor and the Saint*. That is until the story’s author became Fiona herself! Though mistreated, cast out by her pompous family, and thrown into the battle at Heylon, Fiona is determined to use her magic for good. But things take a rather unexpected turn when she rescues the male lead, Siegren, turning him from foe to friend… Will she successfully rewrite her fate without changing the story’s happy ending?

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/51579678), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4623950), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012762)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EA%B3%B5%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EB%82%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8B%A4/2830), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57746592)

title: The Rise of the Bottom Ranked spirit user
summary:
In the year 20XX, the existence of spirits became known to humanity, and those who wielded their power came to be called “Spirit Users.” While mankind used this power to advance society, it was also not uncommon for people to use their powers for evil.
Amidst this backdrop, Yui Shinonome, an overworked office worker fired from an exploitative company, obtains the power of a spirit through a strange twist of fate.
With no time to grasp his new reality, Yui is dragged into the conflicts of Spirit Users and becomes a member of the Bureau of Fairy Affairs, commonly known as the BFA. Thus began his days of solving spirit-related incidents.
Although Yui believed he was hired merely as a general affairs clerk, he is partnered with the BFA’s number one problem child: Mio Shinohara. Despite her immense skill, her reckless, order-defying attitude has caused all of her previous partners to quit, unable to endure working with her.
While the two repeatedly clash, they gradually begin to form a deep bond. Soon, Yui learns of Mio’s tragic past—her parents were murdered by someone who misused spirit powers, leaving her with a strong desire for revenge. Furthermore, it is revealed that the spirit lending Yui its power is no ordinary spirit, but the former Spirit King who was once betrayed and lost his life.
Yui makes a firm vow: to race up the ladder of success and win the heart of his beloved.

title: The Obsessive Emperor’s Capable Pharmacist
summary: Hailey is an obscure palace pharmacist in the BL guideverse rofan novel "Ties of Obsession," which is what the reader vaguely recalls upon waking up in her body. Even without Hailey's memories, the new Hailey thwarts the evil head pharmacist's attempt on Emperor Damion's life and is rewarded with the position of his personal pharmacist. Although the contract Damion makes her sign is a lifelong one, it pays a crazy high salary, and her patient's handsome face is a nice perk. What Hailey doesn't foresee is Damion getting attached to her before meeting his gay lover from the original novel!

title: The Young Genius Paintress
summary:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!
___
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)

title: The Great War
summary:
Im Dajun, who was abandoned by his family and now lives as the leader of a runaway group, one day brings Yeonwoo home by chance. Yeonwoo then commits a violent rampage in Incheon. Standing in the way of Yeonwoo, who was trying to kill a chaebol chairman for revenge, is Yoon Gamin, a top student hopeful. Meanwhile, Nahwajin of the School Authority Protection Bureau watches the situation with interest...

The first crossover in the Blue String Universe! A massive showdown featuring the main characters from [True Education], [Study Group], and [How to Fight]. This is a record of an intense battle not covered in their own stories.

title: Reborn Ranker – Gravity User (Manga)
summary: “Who needs a bandit, anyway?” That’s the last thing Ikoma Ichinose, a bandit-class hunter, heard before he got kicked out of his party and ran into a monster that would kill him. But he was given a second chance at life in the form of a time-turning pocket watch. “Yeah, who needs a bandit?” This time, Ikoma chooses to be a gravity master to have a shot at becoming the greatest hunter of all time.

title: There’s No Such Thing as a Bad Hero in the World
summary:
<You have obtained the skill [Precious Child Status Notification]! You can now more accurately assess the condition of the child who needs your help.>

Edith Irene Bruxelles had one secret: she had experienced possession.

One day, out of nowhere, she became Edith. Not only that, she was in a completely different era, in a strange country she had never heard of before!

And, on top of that, she had an unusual ability that others couldn't see.

To return to her original life, Edith chose to enter into a contractual marriage with a genius sorcerer Duke.

"Will you marry me?"
"Yes! I’d love to!"

However...

"What’s going on? Do you really think you’re the Duchess of the Duke’s family?"
"Bruxelles? Has anyone even heard of that family?"

The nobles reject her because she comes from a fallen family.

"Actually, this is great!"

She thinks positively and goes about her life, but she keeps running into children who are struggling behind the social scenes.

<Stress: 130/100 [Danger!!]>
[Appropriate action for the Precious Child is required.]

"Miss, could you please hold the child's hand?"

Unable to watch any longer, she steps in, and before she knows it, she becomes known as the "fixer."

"Duchess, I was hoping we could meet privately next week."
"I’d like that too. Would you be able to come to our residence?"

The story of how I, once an outcast in high society, became the top invitee.

Finally adjusting to the changed atmosphere, now her husband is acting strangely.

"Is that something you normally say you like?"
"Well, I guess so?"
"If that's the case, then what I like is you."

Oh my, who in the world confesses like that!?

(Source: Kakao Page, edited)

title: I’m Done Being Your Best Friend
I Regressed, but the World didn’t End
summary:
Humanity’s last hope just got a second chance… and a mountain of debt. 

Dohyeok, the champion of humankind, is sent back in time to stop the apocalypse. He then pours his time, money, and soul into preparing for an alien invasion that never comes. 

Now chased by creditors instead of aliens, Dohyeok turns to game streaming to repay his debt. 

Follow the ex-hero-turned-streamer as he hacks his way through popular game titles one epic stream at a time!

title: One Night With Deep Passions
summary:
One drunken night led her into the wrong room—a room where she provoked a devil who could never be sated. When dawn broke, she fled in a panic. However, he continued to linger around her like a haunting shadow, overwhelming her with his flirtatious behavior.

He declared that the one night spent together meant that they must show endless devotion to each other for the rest of their lives. 

Every moment, thoughts of her consumed him, and the devil demanded she take responsibility.

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: A Stepmother’s Märchen
summary:
They called her the Iron Widow. 

When her husband died, he left her to manage not only his vast holdings but also his four children. Young and inexperienced, Shuri nonetheless tried her best to raise them, despite their bitter attitude towards her. She is finally free to live her own life as her eldest son marries… only to find herself mysteriously reset to seven years ago — the night of her husband's funeral. 

Can Shuri find happiness with this second chance at a new destiny?

title: The Best Martial Arts Instructor In The World
summary: The Demonic Cult Leader, Seok Woncho, was a monster who even surpassed the Blood Cult Leader. Do you know who killed him? “Ha Mu-baek.” “But why are you bringing that up…?” “Because he’s coming to our Mengryong Academy as an instructor.” …Damn it. We’re screwed! Ha Mu-baek, the greatest martial artist who crushed both the Demonic Cult and the Blood Cult, is now assigned as an instructor at a martial arts training academy due to a political power struggle. Determined to live quietly while keeping his identity hidden, he soon finds himself solving the problems of cadets with heart-wrenching backstories, disciplining the trashy human scum at the academy, and inexplicably becoming busier by the day… Welcome! It’s your first time meeting a genius lunatic instructor, isn’t it?!

title: You Were My Slave
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

title: Absolute Love Enforcement The Reason Why a Female Soldier Became The Beloved Character in Her New Life
The Abandoned Saintess’s Vow: To Deny the Prince’s Love in Her Next Life
Murim Login
summary:
Large numbers of monsters come out the gate which is the boundary of the world. After many sacrifices, People won the fight against monsters through their awakening. Jin Taekyung is alive as an 'F class hunter' which is the lowest level. After Jin has a hard time, he gets an old capsule then he goes into the capsule that is the martial heroes' world. And the game system gives him special abilities, he starts growing up to become the best martial hero.  

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%A1%9C%EA%B7%B8%EC%9D%B8-%EB%AC%B4%EB%A6%BC/2384)
---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11042/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/55123)

title: Standard of Reincarnation
summary:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.

title: Chronicles of the Demon Faction
summary:
In an ancient world where martial artists reign supreme, Unseong can only watch as his master is brutally beaten to death after a false accusation of practicing forbidden demonic arts. Even after a valiant fight, he fails to kill those responsible and faces his own end. But fate has other plans… Instead of taking his last breath, he awakens as a child, training to be an elite soldier of a demonic sect. Now Unseong must embrace the demonic arts and harness power in his ultimate quest for revenge.

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5Ap-KOIYUqw) | [JP](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l8bRXNwJojI) | [CN](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VrTrHgv5ndc)  | [TW](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iN_NifT0mvI)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/26650)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/chroniques-demoniaques)

title: True Education
summary:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

title: My Contractually Married Husband Wants Me
At the Place Where the Golden Rose Broke
summary: No summary available.

title: Back to Spring
summary: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!

title: I Become The Youngest Disciple of The Martial Arts Leader
The Symbiotic Relationship Between the Rabbit and the Black Panther
summary:
I was a rabbit shapeshifter who couldn't even transform into a human by my coming of age ceremony. My family said that I was just a halfling and placed me in a basket…

"You're crying? Go on, cry more."

Then I was then picked up by a black panther with an awful personality.

"You're lacking in fighting spirit. I'll eat you the day after tomorrow, so keep trying."

This fierce beast. Staring at my trembling face, the black panther's eyes glistened.

"How thrilling."

Mom, I think he's crazy! To survive a fairly crazy black panther.

"The wild beasts are possessive, no matter what it is."

…Is it possible?

---
Vivi is a... wererabbit?! As a creature that’s supposed to transform into a human, Vivi is a failure, demonized as cursed and sent off to her doom. Luckily, her demise is cut short as Ahin of the Black Leopard Clan saves her. But with every threat and command this temperamental heir tosses at Vivi, she’s questioning her safety (and sanity). Surrounded by carnivores and their strong pheromones, she'll try to survive the chaos while stuck in her rabbit form. Will she figure out how to transform and tap into the power within her cute, furry self?

title: Extra but the Duke’s only daughter
summary: I squandered my salary to strengthen my game character, and became the lowest-ranking extra in the game. But… [◆Fate: On my 9th birthday, I will be horribly murdered by my father.] No, what is my fate?! It was unfair that I dimensionally shifted while playing a game, but now I will die by my father’s hand… I can’t just sit back and accept this crappy fate. Since it has come to this, I will overcome my fate myself!

title: Selena
summary: Welcome to Wellenberg, Meuracevia at the turn of the 19th century. The fate of Serenity Hotel, an opulent hotel in the nation’s capital, hangs by a thread as its headstrong heiress Serena and her stern husband Eiser struggle to turn its fortune around. Their loveless marriage of convenience takes a twisted turn following Serena’s jealous attachment to her stoic and handsome servant, Frederick. At a time when happiness takes a back seat to one’s sense of duty, will Serena be able to protect her love and ensure the survival of her family and her business?

title: Absolute Dominion
summary: Twenty years have passed since the Great War, but petty theft and exploitation have taken root during times of peace. The once dazzling world of Murim is a mere shadow of its former self, but one young enigmatic swordsman has sworn to restore Jianghu to its former glory. Will the noble principles of justice and loyalty prevail over corruption and greed?

title: I’m Looking for a New Husband
summary:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…

title: Close and Secretive
summary: On that day, I was going to confess to you. Choi Ji-young, an unidentified woman who accidentally encountered her on Ulleungdo Island. Sunwoo Hyun keeps bothering Ji-young. Two people who are attracted to each other even in a short period of time. Then one day, Ji-young suddenly disappears. Without a trace. “It’s been a while, Hyun. Aren’t you going to say hello?” Ji-young, who could not be found no matter how much she visited, became the “Choi Ji-an” and appeared in four years. That’s also for Hyun to protect. “With this time, there is no Choi Ji-young I knew. So, just delete it too.”

title: The doomsday ruthless man: hoarding trillions of supplies at the beginning
summary: The earth is affected by unknown energy, the core expands, and natural disasters and doomsday come. Extreme heat, earthquakes, volcanic eruptions, floods, severe cold... natural and man-made disasters come one after another! Su Chen struggled through the apocalypse and finally entered the safe zone, but was betrayed by his girlfriend in the end! Reborn and returned to one month before the end. This time, I only live for myself!
